title: Discuss amongst yourselves
author: VD
content_html: I’ve got some work to do and limited Internet access today, so I’ll post this early and turn my attention towards the Super Bowl. As a Black-and-Blue division man, I’ll be cheering for the Bears; if they can keep from getting blown out early, I think they’ll outlast Manning and company.
